articles.author: Linda Searing
articles.title: Falls are the leading cause of injury among older Americans - The Washington Post
articles.description: Falls are the leading cause of injury among those 65 and older, and the cause of 95 percent of hip fractures.
articles.content:
About 1 in 4 U.S. adults 65 and older more than 14 million people suffer a fall each year, according to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.
